title: The Black Rabbits of Fibonacci
abstract:
In this note, we use a toy problem of detecting cycles of length two in a
tent map to highlight some curious phenomena in the behavior of discrete
dynamical systems. This work presents no new results or proofs, only computer
experiments and illustrations. Thus, it serves as light reading and does not
aim to be a scientific paper but is rather educational in nature. For this
reason it is accompanied by numerous illustrations.
